item.description:
@He_Has_LOGS wrote:

[quote=“Liam123, post:2, topic:121380”]the case ****: change the asterisk too the number of object.

and pickup command;

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 3)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Don't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Type It Right."); } } [/quote]

The Object thing… 299 is haybales. When I goto click on it it doesnt come up.

item.title: Things I need help with - LOOK INSIDE
item.dc:creator: @Liam123 Liam123
item.description:
@Liam123 wrote:

the case ****: change the asterisk too the number of object.

and pickup command;

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 3)) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
					if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("That Item Don't Exist");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Type It Right.");
				}
			}

Read full topic

item.title: Things I need help with - LOOK INSIDE
item.dc:creator: @He_Has_LOGS He Has LOGS
item.description:
@He_Has_LOGS wrote:

I need help with making objects work with exp (I got the coding) It says its correct but I dont get a message or anything when I click.

case 299: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You train defence"); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((700*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((700*playerLevel[2]), 2); actionTimer = 0; } break;

I need the Pickup command because I accidently deleted mine…
I want to put it in admin part of my commands but I dont remember the code.

Now I need to know how to get an interface to pop up when the people log on… Please help.

AND I need help with Anti NULL. If you know how please post.

AND Now my bank says its full… Wow this is certainly the help topic.

Read full topic
